CustomField.description: The Web Proxy Address that forwards requests from PureConnect for Salesforce to the PureConnect server.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify the Web Proxy Address that forwards requests from PureConnect for Salesforce to the PureConnect server. Use https://, the /api path and a final forward slash, e.g. https://web_proxy_address/api/. See the Administrator Guide for more details
CustomField.label: Web Proxy Address
